name: Information Agency Journalist
goal: The goal of the Platform is to inform the public on European integration of Ukraine and raise awareness about the role of Europe for Ukraine and vice versa. Our audience also receives the insight of the process of the implementation of the Association Agreement. They get the info on the vision of the European politicians about the cooperation between Ukraine and Europe
interests: Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, European Neighbourhood Policy, International co-operation and development
euInitiatives:
- Equal economic independence
- Visa policy
- Immigration and Integration
